attributes.review: I was really excited for this app so I downloaded it. Hoping to support our favorite Oompa Loompa I created an account and went about my day. Then shortly after MY PHONE FELL OFF A BUILDING INTO THE OCEAN. AND THIS APP IS TO BLAME!! DO NOT GET THIS APP IT IS BUGGED.
attributes.title: This app broke my phone

attributes.title: stan charli d'amelio for clear skin

attributes.review:
as soon as i downloaded this app, ads flooded my phone. on my lock screen, i could see clips of the Teletubbies and the wiggles from 10 years ago, and this only continued when i opened my phone. i couldn’t access any other apps besides this one because it was all blocking everything and so i couldn’t even play bitlife. whoever made this is an evil person if they won’t let me access my bitlife. 
along with this, i got repeated notifications even after i asked for none. i got at least one every five minutes for an ad, and then another with some random dudes face on the front of it. he had this kinda yellow hair that was a combover, and he was wearing this suit while standing at a podium with some words behind him. “kelp ameruric grate algae”. i wasn’t quite fond of the idea of grating cheese all because this app told me to, and i definitely didn’t want any aquatic plants in my house. 
i have never seen a worse app in my entire life, whoever developed this had no idea what they were doing and they obviously don’t even know how to do their job outside of app development. i recommend deleting this app immediately, or not getting it at all. perhaps it’s a good idea to experience it for a little, just so you can make sure to be able to warn whoever may consider this before they make the biggest mistake of their life. 
the app still sends me notifications, and i keep hearing loud bangs at my door in the middle of the night with people trying to give me these strange red hats. i feel threatened in a way i have never felt before, and i am even more scared to leave the house than previously. i’m not sure i will ever be able to recover from this emotional trauma of having these people stalk me. so don’t get this app. it’s useless, annoying, and it will give you nightmares about dancing cheetos in ugg boots.
attributes.title: this app ruined my life

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE!!!!!! Do not download it! It’s glitchy, tacky, and overall full of misleading information. I was hoping this app would live up to the hype it receives from Donald and his fellow conservatives but it is nothing of that sort, this app is so bad it needs removed from the App Store all together!!!!!!!!!!!! Can’t believe I even downloaded this. 🤢😭🤮
attributes.title: Worst APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review: I was using the app and all of a sudden a giant gummy bear crashed through my window and attacked me. Luckily I had my laser gun to fight it off but it was a tough battle. Then Batman came into my room and got naked and whispered in my ear, “I’m Batman” I got scared so I kicked him in the nuts and ran away, next thing you know my toaster came to life and was having sex with all my furniture. Worst app ever it’s all the apps fault. (Also I lost my virginity to a toaster)
attributes.title: I HATE IT😡🤬
